name: Shattered Hope: Three Houses [ DEMO ]
description:
A fan-made crossover game featuring Fire Emblem: Three Houses and Danganronpa F: Shattered Hope!

For a little explanation, the characters of Danganronpa F: Shattered Hope will be thrown into an Alternate Universe where they're in the Fire Emblem: Three Houses~!

GAME TRAILER

--------------------------------------

Play as the mysterious new PROFESSOR in Garreg Mach Monastery and teach one of the three different houses presented!

Pay attention to your students and their PERSONALITIES. Depending on their questions that you're tasked to answer, each one will react differently!

Pair up specific students that have an AFFINITY with each other to get special scenes shared between the two!

Based on some choices you'll make when interacting with your students, some may take a FANCY to you if you'll pick the right words to say. Choose wisely!

-----------------------------------------------

Choose which house to mentor!

Pick the BLUE LIONS to teach aspiring and chivalric knights that are adept at spear and sword-wielding!

Pick the BLACK EAGLES to teach descendants of nobility and powerful magic casters!

Pick the GOLDEN DEER to teach rambunctious, wild cards that have a variety of skills!

------------------------------------------

Inspired games from Fire Emblem: Three Houses and Danganronpa F Shattered Hope

Character Art, Writing and Programming by Ysabel Verzosa

Background Models by Slade (DeviantArt)

Proofread by Ryan Pratt
